content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_slab
inventory=[{"type": "wolf_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 11}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 17}, {"type": "horn_coral", "quantity": 15, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 30, "index": 22}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 37, "index": 23}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 42, "index": 27}, {"type": "music_disc_chirp", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "player_head", "quantity": 61, "index": 31}, {"type": "splash_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 38, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "redstone_lamp", "quantity": 37, "index": 36}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 44}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 38, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft prismarine_slab, I need to place 3 prismarine blocks side by side in the crafting grid. The first prismarine block is currently in slot 26, so I will move it to slot 1.
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_slab

thought: I have already placed one prismarine block in the crafting grid, so I will now move the second prismarine block from slot 26 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 26 to slot 2 with quantity 1
